resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/105415</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>105415</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Elections... the American Way</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wahlen... die amerikanische Methode</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Élections... la voie américaine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Eleições... a maneira americana</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Elezioni... il modo americano</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εκλογές... ο αμερικανικός τρόπος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Elecciones... la manera americana</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">looks at political campaigns by exploring the history and roles of candidates and voters, the structure of the party system and election process, and tough issues that politicians have faced over the years.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Blicke auf politische Kampagnen durch das 
Erforschen der Geschichte und der Rollen der Anwärter und der 
Wähler, der Struktur des Parteisystem und -wahlprozesses und der 
haltbaren Ausgaben, die Politiker über den Jahren gegenübergestellt 
haben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">regards aux campagnes politiques en explorant 
l'histoire et les rôles des candidats et les électeurs, la structure
du processus de système et d'élection de partie, et issues dures aux
lesquelles les politiciens ont faites face au cours des années.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">olhares em campanhas políticas explorando o 
history e os papéis dos candidatos e os eleitores, a estrutura do 
processo do sistema e da eleição do partido, e edições resistentes
que os políticos enfrentaram sobre os anos.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sguardi alle campagne politiche esplorando la 
storia ed i ruoli dei candidati ed elettori, la struttura del processo
del sistema e di elezione del partito ed edizioni dure che i politici 
hanno affrontato nel corso degli anni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τις πολιτικές εκστρατείες με να ερευνήσει την
ιστορία και τους ρόλους των υποψηφίων και των ψηφοφόρων, τη δομή 
της διαδικασίας συστημάτων και εκλογής συμβαλλόμενων μερών, και 
τα σκληρά ζητήματα που οι πολιτικοί έχουν αντιμετωπίσει κατά τη 
διάρκεια των ετών.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">miradas en las campañas políticas explorando la 
historia y el papeles de candidatos y votantes, la estructura del 
proceso del sistema y de la elección del partido, y ediciones 
resistentes a que los políticos han hecho frente sobre los años.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206368</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>105415</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/elections-the-american-way</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
